actions.description: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Serrated Sword

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Tail

specialTraits.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it bursts into flames and is reduced to ashes. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the draconian must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) fire damage.
specialTraits.name: Death Throes
